review: Google cast sucks so you have to pay money to use it well that sucks I think Amazons fire tv is better they don't shove a bill down your neck they let you choose what you want to pay for

review: Omg love love this little gadget. Bought 4 over the holidays for us and family members. Easy to hook up. Took a little bit to get used to using my phone as the remote but I love that I don't have another remote to fuss with. Even my dad who's in 60's uses this with ease. I highly recommend If you watch Netflix, Hulu etc it's awesome!
author: ttower
